items.badge_description: First brewed in the early 16th century, this peculiar flavored beer has made quite the come back. With a tart, salty combination, your taste buds are probably still tingling... and excited for more! That's 5 different beers with the style of Gose. Try 5 more for Level 2!

user.bio: www.mondobirra.org Dal 2003 si occupa di birra artigianale. La passione è la birra, il lavoro di ogni giorno, è un altro

Un sommelier della birra che prende tutto alla leggera! 
A beer sommelier who takes everything easy!

Life is too short to drink industrial beer!
Fav styles: IPA/APA/DIPA/BIPA/ISA, Stout/Porter/IS/IP. New beers everyday.

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 5 different venues categories as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Some may argue that wine is better than beer, especially in a country so well known for its vineyards. We all know they’re wrong. Cheers! That’s 10 different beers from a brewery in Italy. Try 5 more for Level 3.

user.bio:
Life is too short to drink industrial beer!
Fav styles: IPA/APA/DIPA/BIPA/ISA, Stout/Porter/IS/IP. New beers everyday.

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 75 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 16.

user.bio:
Life is too short to drink industrial beer!
Fav styles: IPA/APA/DIPA/BIPA/ISA, Stout/Porter/IS/IP. New beers everyday.

items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 55 different beers that been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 12!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 45 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 10!

items.checkin_comment: Usually not my thing, but this Gose is worth a drink. Fruity and salty, light sourness: best sample of the style I had.

user.bio:
Life is too short to drink industrial beer!
Fav styles: IPA/APA/DIPA/BIPA/ISA, Stout/Porter/IS/IP. New beers everyday.
Lately I've started drinking more and it turns out, I like it. I'm pretty good at it.
I live on books and hops. As a synesthete, I love the IPAs that smell the most like flamingos.
I like you even better if you bring me beer!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 180 distinct venues!

First brewed in the early 16th century, this peculiar flavored beer has made quite the come back. With a tart, salty combination, your taste buds are probably still tingling... and excited for more! That's 35 different beers with the style of Gose. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Some may argue that wine is better than beer, especially in a country so well known for its vineyards. We all know they’re wrong. Cheers! That’s 140 different beers from a brewery in Italy. Try 5 more for Level 29.

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 5 different beers that been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 45 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 10!
